name: The Bund
description: The Bund — Iconic waterfront area with colonial-era buildings and stunning skyline views. Popular outdoor attraction with scenic views and good photo opportunities. Typical visit ~60 minutes.

name: Yu Garden
description: Yu Garden — Classical Chinese garden with pavilions, rockeries, and ponds dating back to the Ming Dynasty. Beautiful traditional gardens and architecture. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Shanghai Tower
description: Shanghai Tower — The tallest building in China with an observation deck offering panoramic views of the city. Well-curated indoor spot with amazing city views. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Nanjing Road
description: Nanjing Road — Famous shopping street with a mix of traditional stores and modern malls. Shopping area with stores and local vendors; good for browsing. Typical visit ~120 minutes.

name: Jade Buddha Temple
description: Jade Buddha Temple — Buddhist temple known for its two jade Buddha statues and serene atmosphere. Historic or religious site, usually quiet and culturally significant. Typical visit ~45 minutes.

name: Shanghai Museum
description: Shanghai Museum — World-class museum showcasing ancient Chinese art, including ceramics, paintings, and calligraphy. High-quality museum with notable collections; allow more time. Typical visit ~120 minutes.

name: Xintiandi
description: Xintiandi — Trendy area with restored Shikumen houses now serving as cafes, restaurants, and shops. Popular entertainment and shopping district. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Oriental Pearl Tower
description: Oriental Pearl Tower — Futuristic TV tower with observation decks and a revolving restaurant. Well-curated indoor spot with panoramic city views. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Tianzifang
description: Tianzifang — Artistic enclave with narrow alleys filled with galleries, boutiques, and eateries. Shopping and art area with unique local character. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Shanghai Disneyland
description: Shanghai Disneyland — Large theme park featuring Disney-themed rides, shows, and attractions. Popular outdoor attraction; plan a full day visit. Typical visit ~360 minutes.

name: Fuxing Park
description: Fuxing Park — Beautiful park with French-style gardens, a lake, and recreational areas. Popular outdoor attraction with scenic views and good photo opportunities. Typical visit ~60 minutes.

name: Shanghai Science and Technology Museum
description: Shanghai Science and Technology Museum — Interactive museum with exhibits on science, technology, and natural history. High-quality museum with notable collections; allow more time. Typical visit ~150 minutes.

name: Longhua Temple
description: Longhua Temple — Ancient Buddhist temple complex with beautiful architecture and gardens. Historic or religious site, usually quiet and culturally significant. Typical visit ~60 minutes.

name: People's Square
description: People's Square — Central public square surrounded by museums, theaters, and government buildings. Popular outdoor attraction with good access to other sites. Typical visit ~45 minutes.

name: Shanghai Circus World
description: Shanghai Circus World — Venue offering spectacular circus performances featuring acrobatics and stunts. Well-curated indoor entertainment; evening shows recommended. Typical visit ~120 minutes.

name: Zhujiajiao Water Town
description: Zhujiajiao Water Town — Ancient water town with canals, traditional architecture, and charming streets. Popular outdoor attraction; plan a half-day visit. Typical visit ~180 minutes.

name: Shanghai Botanical Garden
description: Shanghai Botanical Garden — Expansive garden featuring diverse plant species, themed gardens, and greenhouses. Popular outdoor attraction with scenic views. Typical visit ~120 minutes.

name: M50 Creative Park
description: M50 Creative Park — Contemporary art district with galleries, studios, and cafes in a former industrial area. Well-curated indoor spot for art enthusiasts. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Shanghai Ocean Aquarium
description: Shanghai Ocean Aquarium — Large aquarium featuring marine life from around the world and underwater tunnels. Well-curated indoor spot; great for families. Typical visit ~120 minutes.

name: Century Park
description: Century Park — Spacious urban park with lakes, gardens, and recreational facilities. Popular outdoor attraction with scenic views and good photo opportunities. Typical visit ~90 minutes.

name: Shanghai Grand Theatre
description: Shanghai Grand Theatre — Modern performing arts venue hosting operas, ballets, and concerts. Well-curated indoor entertainment; check performance schedule. Typical visit ~150 minutes.
